comments.text:
The Seven Stages Of love 
(1) Dilkashi = Attraction.                 (2) Uns = Attachment, 
Friendship.                       (3) Mohabbat =  Affection,  kindness,(or) 
An act of selfishness in which one seek  something in return               
        (4) Aqiedat = Faith, Trust.
(5) Ebadat = Worship, Reverence, Obedience with Submission.  
(6) Junoon = Passion, Obsession, Addiction, Madness, Craziness.  
(7) Maut = Bereavement, Death, Mortality, End ﻿
